name: Nitin Gupta
about: Nitin was helping out his father at their recharge shop after finishing his class 12th. Now he works for CodeYug, Delhi as a Software Developer.

name: Annu Bharti
about: Annu hailing from Kishanganj, Bihar is working at Mindtree. Living in a village she barely had access to good education. Now she wishes to establish another Navgurukul in  her own village.

name: Aman Sharma
about: Aman Sharma Completed his 12th from MP(Bord). he started his journey on july 2018 and now he is working in safal solution as a PHP Developer.

name: Kajal Ahirwal
about: Kajal an 18 year old girl, who just finished her tenth class, with less than 6 months of training at Navgurukul - is now working at Mindtree.  Based out of Delhi, her father is a rickshaw puller and mother a domestic cook in Delhi.

name: Sunil
about: Sunil has passed his 12th class last year. He was not able to took admission in collage because of his less marks. Then he joined Navgurukul. Now he is working as a java developer at Safal Solutions, Hyderabad

name: Shivam Raj
about: Shivam (12th pass) was working as a helper at a local bakery and then at a call center. He is now working as a Software Developer at GamingMonk, Delhi.

name: Khushboo Pandit
about: Khushboo did her schooling through the help of NEEV Foundation. She joined NavGurukul when she was 16 and can currect code well in ReactJS, Python and Node.js

name: Nitesh Sharma
about: Nitesh completed BCA from Sant Singaji Institute Of Science & Management. Interested in social welfare and solving problems through facilitation and ground-work.

name: Rani Pandit
about: Rani(pursuing 12th) through NEEV foundation.Joined NavGurukul in December 2017 and now she is working in Momspresso as a Web Developer.

name: Vishal Gaddam
about: Vishal Gaddam completed his graduation in B.Sc.IT from Mumbai University. He joined NavGurukul in June 2018 and now he is  working as Curriculum Designer.

name: Anoop Gupta
about: Anoop Gupta completed his graduation from Kanpur University. he started his journey as a programmer from NavGurukul. He is  working in Repup(Gurgaon) as a Software Developer

name: Naresh Kumar Gautam
about: Naresh (10th pass) hails from Delhi and is currently working in Gurgaon. Interested in sports and Art and craft.

name: Savita Verma
about: Savita Verma(Debater) is a freelance content writer and also working on outreach at NavGurukul to onboard partners for admission of new students.
